Class AgletListPanel<ITEM>

java.lang.Object

                  com.ibm.aglets.tahiti.AgletListPanel<ITEM>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AgletListPanel<ITEM>
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A class that embeds a JList to show agent data in the main Tahiti window.

Author:
Luca Ferrari cat4hire@users. sourceforge.net
